short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate QR code for current/custom URL, sharing to other devices. Questions? Contact cameoshell09@gmail.com
short.zh_CN: 为当前或自定义 URL 生成二维码，方便分享到其他设备。有问题请联系 cameoshell09@gmail.com。
short.zh_TW: 為目前或自訂 URL 產生二維碼，方便分享到其他裝置。有問題請聯絡 cameoshell09@gmail.com。

long.zh_TW: "Auto Refresh mini" is an easy-to-use browser extension that automatically refreshes web pages at intervals you set. It can also monitor whether a specific button or link appears on a web page and automatically click it, perfect for busy users who need automatic page management.
